Black Skull

The Black Skull is a special item in Remixed Dungeon used for resurrection, particularly important for the Lich subclass.

Description

The Black Skull is a dark magical artifact that can be used to resurrect the hero upon death. It functions similarly to an Ankh but with specific mechanics for the Lich subclass. When used, it preserves more equipment but has specific requirements for the Necromancer with Lich subclass.

Stats

  • Type: Resurrection item
  • Durability: Single use
  • Value: N/A (quest item)

Special Properties

  • Resurrection: Revives the hero upon death
  • Equipment Preservation: Preserves more equipment than normal
  • Lich Specific: Required for Lich subclass resurrection mechanics
  • Mastery Condition: Can be used for mastery progress for the Lich subclass

Acquisition

The Black Skull is typically obtained:

  • As a quest reward for Necromancer heroes
  • Through special events in the dungeon
  • Occasionally from specific enemies in the Necropolis

Usage

  • Used automatically when the hero dies if in inventory
  • For Lich subclass, using a Black Skull with full skill points grants access to the Lich subclass

Strategy

  • Keep one as a backup resurrection item if playing as Necromancer
  • Essential for unlocking the Lich subclass when playing as Necromancer
  • More reliable than the standard Ankh for certain builds

Technical Details

  • Implementation: BlackSkull.java
  • Black Skull of Mastery: BlackSkullOfMastery.java
  • String resources: BlackSkull strings

Related

  • Ankh - Similar resurrection item
  • Necromancer Class - Class that uses Black Skull
  • Lich Subclass - Subclass connected to Black Skull
  • Necropolis - Level where Black Skulls appear
